abstract: United Nations Security Council agrees to withdraw 2,750 peacekeeping troops and police officers from Haiti.
snippet: The United Nations Security Council agreed to withdraw 2,750 peacekeeping troops and police officers from Haiti, bringing the force’s size close to where it was before the 2010 earthquake.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations Security Council agreed to withdraw 2,750 peacekeeping troops and police officers from Haiti, bringing the force’s size close to where it was before the 2010 earthquake.
